item.title: Yosys One Liners - AXI
item.description: The AXI spec says “On Manager and Subordinate interfaces, there must be no combinatorial paths between input and output signals.” If we have a design containing an AXI Manager or Subordinate as netlist (i.e. post proc) and the AXI ports contain axi_ we can check this automatically using this Yosys one liner: flatten; select -assert-none i:*axi_* %coe* o:*axi_* %cie* %i If that fails we can use show i:*axi_* %coe* o:*axi_* %cie* %i to then see the combinational path (or using dump/printattrs/select -list instead of show when the design is too large for show).
